title: accessor
description: A typed accessor into a buffer-view.  WebGL: see vertexAttribPointer().

bufferView.description: The id (JSON property name) of the referenced buffer-view.

byteOffset.description: The offset relative to the buffer-view in bytes.  Must be a multiple of the size of the data type.  WebGL: see vertexAttribPointer() offset parameter.

byteStride.description: The stride, in bytes, between attributes referenced by this accessor.  WebGL: see vertexAttribPointer() stride parameter.

count.description: The number of attributes referenced by this accessor, not to be confused with the number of bytes or number of components.

type.description: Valid values are BYTE (5120), BYTE_VEC2, BYTE_VEC3, BYTE_VEC4, UNSIGNED_BYTE (5121) UNSIGNED_BYTE_VEC2, UNSIGNED_BYTE_VEC3, UNSIGNED_BYTE_VEC4, SHORT (5122), SHORT_VEC2, SHORT_VEC3, SHORT_VEC4, UNSIGNED_SHORT (5123), UNSIGNED_SHORT_VEC2, UNSIGNED_SHORT_VEC3, UNSIGNED_SHORT_VEC4, FLOAT (5126), FLOAT_VEC2 (35664), FLOAT_VEC3 (35665), FLOAT_VEC4 (35666).  Corresponding typed arrays: Int8Array, Uint8Array, Int16Array, Uint16Array, and Float32Array. WebGL: see vertexAttribPointer() type and size parameters.

max.description: Maximum value of each component in this attribute.

min.description: Minimum value of each component in this attribute.

name.description: The user-defined name of this accessor.  This is not necessarily unique among accessors.
